title: iFFALCON 108 cm (43 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Android TV  (43K61)

product_specification.In The Box: 1N LED TV, 1N Stand, 1N Audio Cable, 1N User Manual, 1N Warranty Card , 1N - Remote, 2N - Batteries
product_specification.Other Video Features: HDR 10, Rich Color Enhancement, Wide Color Gamut, Micro Dimming
product_specification.Sound Mode: Standard, Movie, Music, Voice, Game, Stadium, Personal
product_specification.Other Audio Features: Dolby Audio MS 12, Sound Modes, Equalizers - Dynamic/Standard/Movie/Music/Voice/Game/Stadium/Personal, Dolby Audio Atmos, DTS
product_specification.Other Remote Control Features: Voice Input, Netflix Hot Key on Remote, Google Assistant Hotkey on Remote
product_specification.Other Power Features: Instant Power ON, ECO Energy Efficiency
product_specification.Stand Type: Wall Mount and Table Top Stand
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Warranty of the Product is Limited to Manufacturing Defects Only
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear to Magnetic Heads, Audio, Video, Laser Pick-ups and TV Picture Tubes, Panel, Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent, Liability for Loss of Data, Recorded Images or Business Opportunity Loss.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience The installation will be done within 48 hours of delivery of the TV. The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. The wall mount is not included in the box and will be chargeable. The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features. The process generally covers: Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested. Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked. Demonstration of features and settings Quick run-through on how to operate the TV.

product_description.4K UHD: Watch your favourite shows and movies in stunning clarity. This TV produces stellar details in all shades of light and offers you an incredible TV-viewing experience.
product_description.High Dynamic Range 10: Get a flawless picture quality in every scene. The HDR-10 lets you experience a wider colour gamut and optimum contrast representation by dynamic scene-by-scene adjustment of your content.

The first 55-inch unit shipped in mid-April developed a display problem after one day's use. The TV screen had horizontal lines flashing and moving from top to bottom of the panel. Several calls to Iffalcon customer service did not result in a technician visit to evaluate and fix it. They even canceled my service request twice stating they could not reach my number - that was false.Finally contacted Flipkart regarding return and they did initiate the return. But due to the Covid restrictions, the uninstall and return of the defective unit also got delayed. Finally received the replacement unit in early June. After two days use, the new one appears to be OK. Will update if this one develops issues.

Hopefully you never have to call for service and trust your service experience with Iffalcon was better than mine.

1 month since I bought this television

Pros -

1. Value for money as I got it for approximately 30500/- which includes sbi discount.
2. Did not test it with other 4k tv but in comparison to my other FHD 50 Inch tv picture quality is decent enough
3. Audio quality is decent for my room and I don't feel like adding an additional sound bar. You might need one if you want it for home
theatre purpose but for regular usage the attached speakers do the work.
3. I got the television delivered just on the other day of making thr payment but the installation happened 2 days later than the date given to me by Flipkart still I'll not complaint much about it as the installation was quick and smooth.

P.S - you'll have to pay 500/- extra to the installation team for wall mount.
Cons -

1. The application do hang. Especially with prime video I find it difficult to navigate, especially during initation
2. Remote is excessively long. I don't think we need these keypad numbers here. Also the quality of buttons do feel cheap.

Overall I think it's a good tv at this price point

Writing this review after using the TV for a week! The iFFALCON 50inch UHD 4K Smart TV 50K61 is an absolute winner. For the price, this is by far one of the best televisions you could buy especially if you are someone who loves good displays. Let me break this down:

Display: 4K with scale up and dynamic dimming and HDR10 support. Now I was not sure how this was going to work, but once I switched it on and plugged in my PS4 into the ARC HDMI port, I was treated to an experience that I did not get from my previous 4K tv. HDR10 is truly something that you’ll have to see to believe. And this display does not disappoint. Yes the brightness could have been a little bit more in terms of total NITS, but for a bedroom setup that’s dark and cosy, this screen is absolutely brilliant!

Built in Apps: Again, with Android pie out of the box the app support is excellent! And the best part- you get to watch HDR10 content right off the bat with Netflix and other supporting OTT services. The connections are seamless and the WiFi links are solid. I’ve not had an issue with buffering at all over this past week of watching this TV.

Sound: The down firing speakers are good! Maybe not super brilliant or something but they sound really good. However, I use a 5.1 surround system in the room and the sounds are amazing from this TV. The internal processing for audio is excellent.

Delivery and Installation: Now this is where I’ll give full marks! The TV was delivered the next day of ordering and installation happened the same day as delivery! Rithik, the service engineer was very nice! Very polite, very handy with the whole process of installation and demo. It barely took him 20 mins to finish the job and I got my TV wall mounted! So exceptional service by the installation and delivery teams. Thank you Flipkart and TCL for this!

Overall: From a budget perspective, this is by far the best 4K smart tv you could get your hands on. The remote which connects by Bluetooth is seamless and does not loose its connection. The tv processor is quick with sufficient RAM to carry out the actions you request. And the overall viewing experience is fantastic!

I recommend this TV for anyone looking to upgrade to a large screen size without feeling the dent on their wallet! Go for iFFALCON 50K61!
